headline: As Tariff Uncertainty Continues, Here Are 2 American Companies Investors Should Consider
summary: Most of President Trump’s reciprocal tariffs are currently paused, but that may not last much longer.  Tariff uncertainty is significantly lower than it was in April, but it isn’t gone.  If you’re worried about tariff uncertainty, investing in American companies with little exposure can be a good idea.
